definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="337" y="66"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_current_time"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12000</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><comment h="50" pinned="false" w="286">Sets an NBT number tag and adds one number to that tag each time the procedure is run.</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">counter1</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">counter1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="51" pinned="false" w="184">If the NBT number equals 10, it will strike lightning.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">counter1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment h="51" pinned="false" w="316">If the weather in the provided (current) world is raining, or thundering the entity will be extinguished.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_israining"/></value><value name="B"><block type="world_data_isthundering"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_canseesky"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="return_logic"><value name="return"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
